alert.note: Alert for Decatur (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 5:38PM EDT until August 05 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Gadsden County in Big Bend of Florida... Central Leon County in Big Bend of Florida... Southeastern Decatur County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 537 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northwest of Havana, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Quincy, Midway, Havana, Attapulgus, Freemont, Lake Talquin, Littman, Darsey, Florence, Scotland, Jamieson, Gibson, Fred George Park, Laingkat, Santa Clara, Shady Rest, Fowlstown, Amsterdam and Quincy Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
